manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: WHAT IS A YEAST INFECTION? A yeast infection is a common vaginal condition triggered by an overgrowth of yeast, most frequently Candida albicans. This occurrence is prevalent among women of childbearing age, particularly those who have not yet entered menopause. Symptoms of a yeast infection encompass: • Thick, white, or cottage cheese-like vaginal discharge. • Itching or irritation in the vaginal area. • Redness and swelling of the vulva. • Burning sensation during urination or intercourse. Many people with bacterial vaginosis have no symptoms.

YEAST RELIEF: EFFECTIVE TREATMENT FOR YEAST INFECTIONS Addressing the discomfort of yeast infections requires a reliable and rapid treatment solution. Yeast Relief, a clinically proven non-antibiotic treatment, offers swift relief from symptoms like unpleasant vaginal odor and discharge associated with yeast infections. This innovative treatment actively works to normalize vaginal pH and suppress the overgrowth of yeast-causing bacteria. Yeast Relief's efficacy lies in disrupting the attachment of yeast-causing bacteria to the vaginal lining, providing a targeted and comprehensive approach to alleviate symptoms. Trust Yeast Relief for prompt relief and a restored sense of comfort in managing yeast infections.

FAST ACTING Proactively prevents odors and discharge by regulating your pH, diminishing itching in as little as 24 hours. Experience a sense of freshness, cleanliness, and confidence! SUPPORTS VAGINAL HEALTH Addresses symptoms associated with recurring yeast infections such as itching, irritation, unusual vaginal odor, and abnormal discharge. An accessible and cost-effective over-the-counter treatment option. BACKED BY SCIENCE While numerous alternative feminine hygiene products may fall short, Terramed Yeast Relief treatment is proven to swiftly restore a refreshing sensation.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love being able to use a natural alternative to yeast relief. The delivery was fast! Perfect when you need it now. Comes In individual sealed applicators. Easy to use and quick relief.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A nice alternative
reviews.reviewText: This product is a nice alternative to chemical-laden products for the same purpose. It appears to work, which is exactly what it needs to do. It is also a good value for the money. There are some issues, however, that bring it down to a 4 star product. First of all, it is old-school in that it is not an immediate cure. For those accustomed to the "one day" products, this one might disappoint in that way. Secondly, it is also old-school in that you use it at night and have to stay in bed until the morning. And please wear a pad or be ready for wetness. These things are not daunting enough for me to refuse to purchase it in the future.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Works good and easy to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I used this product as a more natural solution, that’s why I chose this product. There were no instructions except on side of box. I used two nights in a row, slight burning but it subsided. It said it may burn a little. The next morning the skin was red, inflamed, and burning. Not worth it !!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This was an interesting thing to try for sure. The concept is simple. It’s a syringe with a rounded top that’s easy to insert. To be honest, I really didn’t feel it being administered. I had to double check if it was actually dispensing anything. The solution is lightweight and almost oily. I found it easy to dispense, though I had some trouble getting the last bits out. It has to be used laying down to avoid leaks, so make sure you have a trash can next to you. They also suggest using a pantyliner for leakage, but I would suggest taking it further considering the amount of residual wetness I woke up to. It can be a bit convenient to have to stay still for the night, but it’s fine as long as you don’t have an urgent situation. It doesn’t solve my problems overnight, but it did get me through the night. I like it enough to use again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It was so easy to apply, great relief and fast acting. Plus fast delivery. Highly recommended!
